headline: GTA Online
subtitle: DEALS ON WHEELS
content:
Looking to get into the acid business? Well, thereâ€™s one game in town, and it only comes in supersize. The MTL Brickade 6x6 allows you to source and make your very own party drops on the go. And with the Maibatsu Manchez Scout C included, you can personally deliver your handmade fun.

Complete First Dose - Off the Rails to receive the MTL Brickade 6x6, acquire the equipment needed and upgrade it at The Freakshop into an Acid Lab. Then work with Mutt to get your new business up-and-running.
